synopsis.text: To the surprise of Miyu, an eighth-grader, her life takes a dramatic turn when her ambitious parents, eager to work for NASA, leave her in the care of an old family friend, Mr. Saionji. Just as she begins to adjust to her new surroundings, Mr. Saionji embarks on a spiritual journey to India, leaving Miyu in the company of his son, Kanata. The unexpected twists don't end there, as an alien baby and its feline-like caretaker crash-land into their home. The baby alien, endowed with telekinetic abilities, affectionately calls Miyu and Kanata "Mom" and "Dad." As they wait for extraterrestrial assistance, the duo faces the daunting task of raising an alien child while navigating their own adolescent lives.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
